msg: Added the newly added license integration test to the automated execution of IT tests.

author: vmassol
msg: Refactoring: use the Plexus Resources component to locate the Clover license specified by the user (using the licenseLocation configuration element). Added a functional test to prove it works.

author: jcompagner
msg: get the last modified date from the jar file if it is a JarUrlConnections.
This to prevent file open issues.
